relevant_findings.decreased_sensation: Posterior and anterior trunk and abdomen.

relevant_findings.abdominal_wall: Diminished tone, unable to rise from supine without assistance.
relevant_findings.sensation: Diminished in a bandlike distribution around the T6 to T12 dermatomes.
relevant_findings.deep_tendon_reflexes: Absent at the biceps on the left and at the ankles bilaterally.

relevant_findings.abdominal_wall_strength: Improved; able to contract rectus abdominis while standing.
relevant_findings.walking: Still had difficulty walking on the heel.
relevant_findings.sensation: Improved but specific details not provided.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient’s sensation and strength improved, but she continued to have difficulty sitting up from a supine position.
